action.action-desc: Mr. Stivers (for himself and Mr. Peters of Michigan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To create jobs and promote fair trade by increasing duties on certain foreign goods imported into the United States.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act .
Subheading 3921.13.50 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States is amended in the general rate of duty column by striking 4.2% and inserting 6.5%.
Subheading 7323.10.00 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the general rate of duty column, by striking Free and inserting 20%; and
in the special rate of duty column, by inserting the following: Free (A, AU, BH, CA, CL, CO, E, IL, J, JO, KR, MA, MX, OM, P, PA, PE, SG).

section.text: The amendments made by this Act shall apply to goods entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, on or after the 15th day after the date of the enactment of this Act.
